Class MySList

  • java.lang.Object
    • container.MySList

  • public class MySList
extends java.lang.Object
    Single linked list implementation of the List interface.

        public void reverse(int m,
                    int n)
        Reverse the items between the specific range in the list
        Parameters:
        m - the index of the first item of the range
        n - the index of the last item of the ragng
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if m,n in [0, size-1]

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int k)
        Rotete the list by k step
        Parameters:
        k - if k > 0, rotate to right by k step, or rotate to left.
